product_description: Sheer fabric adds a hint of edge to a long, flowy shirtdress fashioned with sustainably produced fibers.
product_details_and_care:
Sheer fabric adds a hint of edge to a long, flowy shirtdress fashioned with sustainably produced fibers.
42 1/2" length (size Small)
Front button closure
Point collar
Long sleeves with button cuffs
Chest patch pocket
Sheer
Shirttail hem
74% Tencel® lyocell, 26% polyamide
Tencel lyocell is a sustainably produced fiber made with closed-loop processing
Machine wash, line dry
Imported
Women's Clothing
Item #6104088
